source.oracleReaderQuery:
SELECT BID_ID
          ,MAX(ITEM_FILE_NAME) AS ITEM_FILE_NAME
     FROM  RPA_ODS.RPA_D2B 
     GROUP BY BID_ID

oracleReaderQuery.value:
SELECT * FROM RPA_ODS.RPA_DATAROOM
WHERE TO_CHAR(CREATEDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') =   TO_CHAR(sysdate-1, 'YYYYMMDD') 
AND TO_CHAR(CREATEDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') > '20240828'
;

SELECT * FROM RPA_ODS.TB_SHPPING_MARKET_INDEX
WHERE SUBJECT  = 'SCFI'
AND TO_CHAR(REG_LOG , 'YYYYMMDD') =   TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD') 
;

SELECT * FROM RPA_ODS.RPA_SRM_ITEM_DATA
WHERE TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE,  'YYYYMMDD') =   TO_CHAR(sysdate -1, 'YYYYMMDD') 
AND ITEM_CODE NOT IN ('1000016','1000013','1000007')
;

SELECT * FROM RPA_ODS.RPA_SRM_ITEM_DATA
WHERE TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE,  'YYYYMMDD') =   TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD') 
AND ITEM_CODE IN ('1000016','1000013','1000007')
;

select
       a.sno
      ,a.channel 
      ,replace(replace(replace(regexp_replace(contents, '<[^>]*>|\&([^;])*;', ''), chr(10), '//LF//'), chr(13), '//LF//'), '"','＂') contents 
      ,a.goodsno
      ,a.ordergoodsno
      ,a.regdt
      ,a.moddt
      ,b.goodscd
from cd_beston.es_plusReviewArticle a
    ,cd_beston.es_goods b
where  a.goodsno = b.GOODSNO(+)
